title: S15 Ep75: Playing with Fire: Demons, Exorcism, & Ghosts with guest Billy Hallowell
itunes:title: Playing with Fire: Demons, Exorcism, & Ghosts with guest Billy Hallowell
description:
Today we are joined investigative reporter Billy Hallowell as he delves into the strange phenomena of supernatural activity. Themes of demonic possession, exorcism, and ghosts have overtaken Hollywood, with countless films and TV shows delving into the age-old struggle against evil. But the question is why?

Get the book here: https://amazon.com

Check out his websites here: BillyHallowell.com

PlayingWithFireBook.com

PLUS BIG CHANGES TO DARKNESS RADIO!

We are NO LONGER with PodcastOne, we will be found via Stitcher and their affiliates in the next 2 weeks. We are excited to make this change and hope you continue with us on our journey into, The Darkness on the Edge of Town every week where we will be bringing you 2 new episodes PLUS new True Crime Tuesday shows!
